website_summaries.verdict: Those who choose to invest in the Xpedition III Low from Ecco are in for something quite empowering. From having a true-to-size fit and towering durability to being remarkably comfortable and amazingly stylish, wearers are simply bound to make great strides in this footgear. That being said, a good amount of cash (or credit) is required first to take full advantage of its promised excellence. Nevertheless, the Ecco Xpedition III Low is an astounding trail companion thanks to its host of stellar traits—yes, even with its rather high asking price factored in.
pros: The durability of this Ecco shoe impressed dozens of users
Its fantastic level of comfort shocked a large number of reviewers
Several owners applauded the Xpedition III Low’s enamoring aesthetics
Based on some reports, this day hiker runs true to size
A decent percentage of wearers found the shoe’s width not too tight and not too narrow
This hiking footgear received praises from about a handful of testers for its astonishing arch support
The Ecco Xpedition III Low was considered unbelievably versatile by a very few
cons: Its steep price tag didn’t sit well with a couple of purchasers
An owner wasn’t too happy with the two-day break-in period of this hiker

customer_reviews.title: Super shoe... Great support..
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as he was starting to suffer from sore ankles, feet and hips... (We're a bit older and wiser now and realised he'd had his current saloman shoes for over a year) so these were an early Christmas present. Within a few days all his aches were gone. They're a great fit, very comfortable with great support that you don't realise is there. They're a lot dearer than some other shoe and trainer brands, but worth every penny... We've bought these before and we'll be buying them again! (my dad swears by them too!)
customer_reviews.author: Mamafox

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are well made, comfortable and good looking - ideal for walking or hiking. The fit is excellent - size 9.5-10 is actually a European size 44. I take size 9.5 in shoes and these fit well with thick hiking socks. I cannot rate them as 5-star yet, because it will take time to see how well they last on rough tracks and if they are fully waterproof in thicker, wet vegetation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Falconer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for about 3 months but I've probably walked the best part of 200 miles in them (all on pavement) and they are very comfortable and feel very solid. They are a little large because I often buy UK 8.5 but that size wasn't available. That said, as mentioned I am very happy with the purchase and am happy to recommend them. I haven't used this brand before but I am a convert on the strength of their performance so far.
customer_reviews.author: PHB27

customer_reviews.title: Bit too wide for my fitting
customer_reviews.text: Some size 44 (9.5-10) Ecco shoes/boots fit me. A few, like this one, are slightly too wide and therefore allow the foot to slide around slightly within the boot, unless the laces are tightened unhealthily tight. Sure they'd be fine if you need a slightly wide size 44 (9.5-10) fitting. In all other respects these boots appeared superb - hence 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Geekers

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing failure of waterproofing after only 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: Both pairs I bought started leaking after only 2 months of use. The Gortex lining appears to have failed. Sadly I think that Ecco manufacturing has deteriorated. I've worn Ecco shoes for over 20 year and I'm starting to wonder why.
customer_reviews.author: Apiarist1958

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and very sturdy but frankly speaking
customer_reviews.text: The size of Ecco's shoes is intended to be larger than normal shoes by half a size.Normally I wear 41.5 EU of timberland or 42.5 EU of Nike, but I have to order 41 EU in this deal. Good looking, light weight and very sturdy, but frankly speaking, need time to test its durability. It's suitable for trekking and hiking.The most important thing which surprised me was of its low price when compared with Amazon US and on-line stores in China. But I have to rank it with 4 stars instead of 5, not because of shoe's problem but because of logistics problem. It cost me a long time to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Wang

customer_reviews.title: soles wear out very quickly but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have this shoe 8 months and I have to replace them because the soles have worn. I certainly dont wear them every day and I am surprised how short a time it takes before they need replaced. its the second pair with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wide fitting shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for low level walking, for me they are first class in terms of comfort and quality and they accommodate my wide feet perfectly. I just hope they keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn these lots over the past 6 months and he absolutely loves them. Keeps telling me how comfy they are. They look good and seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jad

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Great support from the rigid and flexible sole. Long lasting upper. Very comfortable and multi purpose. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Genuinereviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but too wide
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these shoes, but they were too wide for my feet. Real shame - I would have loved to keep them!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walks in all weather.
customer_reviews.text: These ecco walking shoes are excellent and fit like a glove,no need to break them in,would highly recommended these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: A wide fitting shoe, just as expected, a little heavier than my previous Ecco shoes, they feel sturdy and expected to last.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and well designed walking shoe. Would buy again. Have always liked this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: A good well made shoe, from good material. I bought these to walk the dog they are comfortable and look okay when i go into a pub with the dog. would highly recommend for the price
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great ECCO value
customer_reviews.text: Great ECCO value. Comfortable and well made. The last soles wore through and can't be repaired so hoping these last a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: 4th pair of Ecco Expidition walking shoes, excexellent quality, pricing thus 4 Star review.
customer_reviews.text: Usually have UK size 9 shoe/boot, had to return & re ordered 9/5 - 10 "44" now perfect fit. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ian & Julie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all round walking/casual shoe. I buy a new pair of these every year and wear them almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: John Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes. A bit clumpy and unfashionable looking but comfy.
customer_reviews.author: DrMagical

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting boot for general use
customer_reviews.text: Good fit very comfortable ,on my feet all day at work these boots have been a good choice
customer_reviews.author: R EDLIN

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid walking shoes - warm and comfortable (needs some breaking in). Great (obviously) in wet weather...
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: These are darker than I expected but are still nice
customer_reviews.author: Athol

customer_reviews.title: They need to be broken in.
customer_reviews.text: 4th pair of these shoes and they still don't let me down
customer_reviews.author: peter lynch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear, 41, this time I bought 40, also seem a bit big
customer_reviews.author: Yu Chengyi

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, Unsupportive & Ill Fitting
customer_reviews.text: My first bad experience of Ecco. Bought these expecting them to be similar to the Expedition iii boots in terms of fit and comfort or at least as comfortable as all other Ecco's I have had. The pair I got looked great but were ill fitting (a big 45 which caused awful heel blistering) uncomfortable ( VERY hard soles) and unsupportive (lots of rocking on heels). So they've gone back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ecco ECCO XPEDITION III, Men’s Low Rise Hiking Shoes
product_meta.description: The perfect shoe for hiking, climbing and other sporty pursuits, this active outdoor shoe merges a range of clever technologies that enhance your sporting experience. Receptor® technology provides stability, ensuring your foot makes optimal contact with the ground for outstanding traction quality.
feature_bullets: GORE-TEX waterproof and insulated construction to ensure dry, comfortable feet in wet and cold weather
Direct-injected PU midsole foam and roomy last provide long-lasting cushioning and outstanding hiking comfort
RECEPTOR technology for excellent stability and dynamic support from the ground impact to the toe-off
Durable rubber outsole for outstanding grip and traction on rough terrain
